messages.title: A message from Simon
messages.content: If I am re-elected on May 7th, I will continue to work hard for you and to make the strong case for the better future for our area and our country that only a Conservative Government can deliver.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Simon will help hardworking local people get on in life.
Simon has made sure the Government guarantees the extra £8 billion over the next five years.
Wants to keep police on the streets; tirelessly campaigned for more visible local policing.

issues.economy: Simon will help hardworking local people get on in life.
issues.health: Simon has made sure the Government guarantees the extra £8 billion over the next five years for the NHS.

housing.content: Working with local people, he has successfully opposed unsuitable developments.

leaflet.personalStatement: If I am re-elected on May 7th, I will continue to work hard for you and to make the strong case for the better future for our area and our country that only a Conservative Government can deliver.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has brought more jobs and investment; secured funding for local schools and the Royal Sussex County Hospital.

endorsements.endorsement: Simon is a strong voice for Brighton Kemptown and Peacehaven – whether it’s working to improve the A259, securing the future of Brighton General Hospital or supporting jobs and apprenticeships in the area.

quotes.text: Simon is a strong voice for Brighton Kemptown and Peacehaven – whether it’s working to improve the A259, securing the future of Brighton General Hospital or supporting jobs and apprenticeships in the area.

images.caption: Image of Simon Kirby interacting with the local community, and endorsements.
